product_name: adidas Terrex Swift Felsfreund Jacket - Men's
long_description: When storms hit the mountains and you're on them, you'll be glad you have the men's adidas Terrex Swift Felsfreund Jacket for waterproof, windproof, breathable protection-and stretch. Climaproof&$174; Storm polyester fabric is highly windproof and waterproof and built for extreme conditions where maximum protection is needed over a long time period. Terrex Swift Felsfreund Jacket also offers stretch for enhanced range of motion in the backcountry. Fully adjustable hood is helmet-compatible. Ventilation zips help control heat build-up and airflow. Adjustable cuffs seal out weather. Zippered hand pockets and single zippered chest pocket stow essentials.
short_description: When storms hit the mountains and you're on them, you'll be glad you have the men's adidas Terrex Swift Felsfreund Jacket for waterproof, windproof, breathable protection-and stretch.
